channel.title: Help me, Im new to making servers!
channel.description: Hello all! I first came about private servers only about a month ago, and ever since then i have been intruiged by them. The whole concept of running Runescape on MY Computer, wow. Bizzare. I would really like to learn how to code java, i have done Pascal and server scripting, very little vb, i know enough html to make a decent website, and some ccs! java seems to me like a whole new territory. so if anyone has msn would you please add and help me out, i need person to person in order to understand it lol, someone i can rely on when i have a question. My msn is Derickisbad123@msn.com Thanks all!

item.title: Help me, Im new to making servers!
item.dc:creator: @Slashx123 Slashx123
item.description:
@Slashx123 wrote:

lol, guess ill be on mopar forums alot… You boys and girls ready to answer a bunch of my questions lmao?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me, Im new to making servers!

item.title: Help me, Im new to making servers!
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:
@monkeykid300 wrote:

It’s nice to see a new DETERMINED coder in this community, why not visit the java coding conventions? Or perhaps look at tutorials to learn. Tutorials are basicly what tought me how to code, of course I tought myself a lot. With practice and determinination anyone could be a good coder.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me, Im new to making servers!

item.title: Help me, Im new to making servers!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Well, it would be best to find out things for yourself.
There are many tutorials out there that help people learning Java.

And I know, you may not want to learn it that way.
But there are other ways!

I never followed any real java tutorial.
The downsides is that my vocabulary in Java is not at par with my coding.

I’ve downloaded sources and took in how everything works.
My best bet to you is to perhaps look at sources.
If you really are hoping to learn, you should be able to do some cool things in about a week.

Learn first: Declaring

Read full topic
